title: Himanta opens new assembly secretariat building
description: Guwahati: Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma on Monday inaugurated the new assembly secretariat building, a digital museum and the artificial intelligence-p.
content: In a momentous event for Assam, Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma unveiled a modern 17-storey assembly secretariat, a cutting-edge digital museum, and an innovative AI-driven information system dubbing it 'ALISA'. This state-of-the-art secretariat f... [1827 chars]

title: California braces for a major winter storm expected to bring heavy rain and snow
description: Pacific Gas & Electric said in a news release that it was using artificial intelligence and machine-learning enhanced weather models to help determine where to send crews and equipment like power poles and transformers ahead of the storm. The utility company stressed that, unlike most winter storms, the anticipated weather event will “progress in several phases,” with multiple storm systems moving through the region that will likely intensify the risks from wind, rain and snow.
content:
Much of California on Monday was preparing to be hit by a powerful winter storm carrying treacherous thunderstorms, high winds and heavy snow in mountain areas.
Jacob Spender, a National Weather Service meteorologist in Sacramento, urged people to ta... [3354 chars]

title: AI minister seeks new investments in Germany, Saudi Arabia, India
description: Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is on his way to Saudi Arabia and India following a visit to Germany.
content:
OTTAWA — Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is on his way to Saudi Arabia and India following a visit to Germany.
He says the visits are about broadening trade alliances and obtaining investment in Canadian infrastructure and technology.

title: Minister witnesses live demonstration of indigenously developed tele-robotic ultrasonography system
description: New Delhi, Feb 16 (PTI) Showcasing India’s growing strength in Artificial Intelligence-enabled healthcare and frontier science, Union minister Jitendra Singh on Monday witnessed the successful live demonstration of an indigenously developed tele-robotic ultrasonography system linking AIIMS, Delhi with Maitri Research Station in Antarctica. Referring to the ongoing Artificial Intelligence (AI) discussions in the national capital, […]
content: The robotic arm, equipped with an ultrasound probe, offers six degrees of freedom, replicating the precise hand movements of an expert sonographer. With force-sensing safety features and diagnostically reliable imaging delivered with less than one-se... [2461 chars]

title: Trust, power and AI: Davos dialogue between Kamath and Harari
description: At Davos, Nikhil Kamath and Yuval Noah Harari discuss the fragility of institutions, the importance of storytelling in human cooperation, and the impact of artificial intelligence on governance and shared truth. They warn of a shift towards personality-driven politics and emphasize the role of trust in both finance and geopolitics. | financialexpress.com

title: Adam Silver: AI Will Give Us ‘Most Significant Change’ in Presentation of Sports
description: The NBA commissioner made some head-scratching comments about artificial intelligence and streaming ratings.
content:

title: Irish Minister welcomes India's "thematic focus" on AI being an all
description: Ireland's Minister for Public Expenditure, Jack Chambers, on Monday lauded India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI), welcoming its emphasis on inclusivity and its vision of using AI as a force for good.
content:
New Delhi [India], February 16 (ANI): Ireland's Minister for Public Expenditure, Jack Chambers, on Monday praised India's approach to Artificial Intelligence (AI), welcoming its emphasis on inclusivity and its vision of using AI as a force for good.
